Class AbstractEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • epidemic.progpracticum.model.AbstractEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bird, Human

    public abstract class AbstractEntity
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<AbstractEntity>
    Abstract class representing simulation object.
    Version:
    Autumn 2013
    Author:
    Monika, Aaron Schraufnagel
    Class Invariant:
    myDaysSick >= 0, the number of days the object has been sick myLocation 0 <= x < world width, 0 <= y < world height

        Specified by:
        compareTo in interface java.lang.Comparable<AbstractEntity>
        Parameters:
        anOther - != null
        Returns:
        is 1 if self healthy while other sick, 0 if both equal, -1 if self sick while other healthy
